query:
SELECT 
  MONTH(FROM_UNIXTIME(dataVenda/1000)) as mes,
  COALESCE(SUM(valorTotal), 0) as totalBruto
FROM vendas
WHERE YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(dataVenda/1000)) = 2025
  AND excluido = 0
GROUP BY MONTH(FROM_UNIXTIME(dataVenda/1000))
ORDER BY MONTH(FROM_UNIXTIME(dataVenda/1000))
